attributes.action: Safeguard Funding for Community Integration Policies
attributes.additional_details:
Dear
         Minister

After the shocking attacks in Woolwich we need to face facts.Our country is not integrating.
Be it the warped Islamists who carried this attack or the violent reactions of right wing organisations and groups.

I ask the government to invest more funding in community integration with all walks of society.

We must show people the Muslim culture;educating people to ensure that there is no threat at large, and show that Britain is an opening and caring place rather than the right wing views we have seen flare in the past few days.

Each side must take steps to combat extremism through education and integration.We must act now to prevent further actions and reactions.
Sign this petition to work together
